original_text: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the Lord doeth valiantly.
korean_text: 의인들의 장막에는 기쁜 소리, 구원의 소리가 있음이여 여호와의 오른손이 권능을 베푸시며

sentences.original_text: The voice of rejoicing and salvation
is in the tabernacles of the righteous
the right hand of the Lord doeth valiantly
